title: Client Lag, Clunky and low fps
body: So I played saturday night/sunday morning until around 4am. Game worked as usual. Turn off pc, turn it back on hours later and suddenly everything is slow. The lobby takes forever to load, champion select animations are literally freezing the screen, and in game I get around the 5-20 fps depending on how much is on the screen. I normally lag a bit but this is just unplayable. Any ideas?

replies.body:
It's possible that your game assets have become corrupted. As a quick check, I suggest [running a repair of your game files](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) to see if it resolves the issue.

Let me know the results.

I had actually tried that first, but nothing changed. I also reset my pc using windows 10 reset option, clean wiped, and re downloaded. Same problem :(
I saw someone on reddit suggest that it was a windows update. The reset downgraded me to windows 8 but I have no idea if windows updates were kept

I suspect there may be an issue going on with your system's hardware. We can investigate further if you submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and attach a set of logs using our [Hextech Toolkit.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367)

Let me know if you have any questions.
